direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to the bag, but addAll adds multiple elements at once.
Both methods modify the bag's contents and handle similar exception scenarios.
Both methods involve checking the presence of elements in the bag, making test cases for one method applicable to the other.
Both methods handle exceptions related to object manipulation and input/output operations.
Both methods interact with external resources (streams) and handle serialization/deserialization.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of a TreeMap for proper functioning.
Setting up a comparator is necessary before adding elements to ensure proper ordering.
Both methods involve verifying the order of elements, making assertions on order-related behaviors.
